comments.raw_text: On every startup I get a ton of reports of leaks due to there not being an autorelease pool.  The stacks go through nsNativeThemeCocoa::nsNativeThemeCocoa being called from the GetService call for the native theme from frame construction.  This is all happening while command-line handlers are being processes and we're opening a browser window, as far as I can tell.

comments.text: I don't think so.  We are not in the middle of opening profile manager when I see the leak, and this is a recent regression.
